website_summaries.verdict: Low top soccer shoe that emphasizes comfort, while giving you great traction on the field.
pros: Deep spikes will provide a nice level of traction on a natural grass surface
Allows freedom of movement in the ankle with the low cut of the shoe
Features a sock-like fit for extra comfort, especially at the top collar of the shoe
Uses a waterproof design to keep your feet dry in all weather conditions
Multiple sizes available in two different colors
cons: This shoe style will run narrow
Shoes have a higher price than average

customer_reviews.title: A bit narrower than expected but great on field agility and ball control
customer_reviews.text: These cleats run a bit on the narrower side, but are otherwise true to the sizing in the size chart. I've played games on both turf and grass fields and .found them to be an improvement in turning and control relative to my older preditos. I've had to play with the laces a bit to get the right feel for overall shoe tightness, and someone with a wider foot might want to go a half size up.
customer_reviews.author: Kat

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful AND comfortable!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are beautiful and so very comfortable! I dont think I'll ever buy any other cleat for soccer!
customer_reviews.author: Diane & Armando

customer_reviews.title: AVOID THIS SHOE AT ALL COSTS!!!
customer_reviews.text: AVOID THIS SHOE AT ALL COSTS!!! Show fit as expected and my daughter loved the shoe. More importantly, the shoe fell apart within 3 months of use. All of the Adidas shoes that my daughter has worn have never been and issue. It is always the cleats on the bottom wearing out. However, this shoe, the stitching around the front of the shoe "literally disintegrated.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wonderful pair of shoes 👌😍
customer_reviews.text: I wear a size 9.5 -10 I decided to buy these in 9 1/2.... I have enough space for my toes no complaints at all & this is my second pair. I will only buy Adidas in this type of shoe.
customer_reviews.author: Catwoman Roxi-baby.....meow.

customer_reviews.title: Good shoe and oroce for the quality
customer_reviews.text: Little tight on the toe box but good shoe overall. We love the older predators bit new ones ha e lots of issues, way too uncomfortable and not able to "break them in"
customer_reviews.author: H. Clements

customer_reviews.title: Fit great and look great on the pitch
customer_reviews.text: I bought these boots for my daughter. She loves them! Fit great and look great on the pitch.
customer_reviews.author: Arsenal FC

customer_reviews.title: "the most comfortable soccer shoe she has ever worn"
customer_reviews.text: My granddaughter who I bought the shoe for and I quote, "the most comfortable soccer shoe she has ever worn".
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase!
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Light but sturdy. I purchased 1/2 size bigger to allow for some wiggle room but fits true to size.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Strong Cleat, daughter loves them, cleats in the heel seem to flex a little much on hard surfaces
customer_reviews.author: newengland00

customer_reviews.title: ... only worn them once and they seem to be comfortable and wide enough for her feet
customer_reviews.text: My daughter has only worn them once and they seem to be comfortable and wide enough for her feet.
customer_reviews.author: Lorie Russo

customer_reviews.title: Soccer is out of season here and good shoes cannot be found easily
customer_reviews.text: My daughter loves these shoes. Soccer is out of season here and good shoes cannot be found easily. Ordered and they were less expensive and are great.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Kerns

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cleats, comfortable and good looking
customer_reviews.text: This is a great set of cleats. They are comfortable and fit snugly, allowing for great traction and movement without your feet sliding around in your shoe. They are a great looking pair of cleats, particularly since they are women's shoes, but aren't pink, purple, or sparkling with glitter. The cleats on the bottom are pronounced, but shaped as to not be sharp or have turf stick to them. The fit is standard, perfect for a normal foot (not needing narrow or wide shoes). The laces can be adjusted to fit various foot types as well, there is plenty of adjustment to get a fit that you prefer.
customer_reviews.author: W Holder

customer_reviews.title: Good performing cleat and it's not pink!
customer_reviews.text: My player will only wear adidas but as most female players know, Adidas has not clued in to making good looking boots for girls. She has been wearing men's cleats because they look cooler and that is sometimes as important as how they play when you are a teen. She said these look like space ships from the top side so not a fan of the coloring still but at least they aren't pink or orange. Fit well and seem to have a little more cushioning that the men's cleats she has been wearing. Good grip on the ball and cuts well doing skill moves.
customer_reviews.author: Picky CO Mom

customer_reviews.title: For "Petite Feet".  If you have a wide foot, these probably will not work
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are quite lightweight. They have a great look to them. The quilted front adds kind of a feminine touch. These shoes are made for “petite feet”. Meaning. . .. If you have a wide foot, they are not going to work. I have the 8.5 size, and the widest part in the front is 3.5”. The heel is 2.75”. I’m measuring the outside of the shoe. . . . just in case this helps. But they are indeed narrow. They are Made in Vietnam. The overall quality looks fine. There is not a lot of cushion inside. Because the sole I plastic, they also do not bend a lot.
customer_reviews.author: G. Hearn

customer_reviews.title: Looks great, doesn’t hold up well.
customer_reviews.text: Fit is a bit narrow but otherwise normal. I’ve worn these for about 9 months, playing with two teams a season, and they really aren’t holding up well. Because they’re so narrow, I’ve worn a hole into the outsole, and it seems like the glue holding the sole on is disintegrating. It’s a shame, because these are some of the only nice and non-girly looking cleats I’ve found.
customer_reviews.author: Alanna Hill

customer_reviews.title: finally some girls soccer cleats without pink
customer_reviews.text: Finally! Some girls soccer cleats without pink! This is a premium looking product and is classy and not ridiculously overstyled. Goes well with many different uniforms.
customer_reviews.author: Jong Lee

product_meta.title: adidas Performance Women's Ace 17.3 FG W Soccer Shoe
product_meta.description: You've already won. It's just going to take 90 minutes for everyone else to find out. Control the game with every touch with ace 17. These Soccer cleats have a women's-specific design and feature a soft leather upper for optimal comfort. Designed for firm ground.
feature_bullets: Shaft measures approximately low-top from arch
Prime mesh upper provides a comfortable, sock-like fit so you can move with instinct to control the ball at high speed
Ultra-thin film on upper helps keep water and debris out
Move with high-speed control and stability on firm ground (third- and fourth-generation artificial grass) with the total control stud alignment
